mapper.insert: insert into cart(c_Id, m_Id, g_Id, c_cnt) values(seq_c_Id.nextval, #{m_Id}, #{g_Id}, #{c_Cnt})
mapper.update: update cart set c_Cnt= c_Cnt + #{c_Cnt} where m_Id=#{m_Id} AND g_Id=#{g_Id}
mapper.select: select c.c_Id, c.m_Id, c.g_Id, c.c_Cnt, g.g_Name, g.g_Price, g.gl_Img1 from cart c left outer join goods g on c.g_Id = g.g_Id where m_Id = #{m_Id}
